resources.string: Welcome to hamrobazar.com ("Hamrobazar / Site"). By using Hamrobazar through website or from any electronic devices (like but not limited to mobile phone application), you acknowledge, understand and agree to following Terms of Use ("Terms").

By posting or submitting any content to the Site, including any audio or visual files, classified advertisement or personal information (collectively, "Your Content"), during the registration, posting, through interactive public forums or any other feature of the Site you affirm, represent and warrant that
(1) you lawfully own or have rights including the copyright, to Your Content

SastoBook is NOT involved in transaction of any goods/services listed in the website. It is only platform to share information. You are directly contacting the person who has posted the advertisement and you agree not to hold Hamrobazar.com responsible for their act in any circumstances.

We strongly encourage you to take necessary precaution. Avoid advance payment, check goods before purchasing, instead of cash use mobile wallets (IME Pay, Esewa, Khalti, Connect Ips, etc) or bank transfer for payments.
